panels.description:
How many individual spendbundles are currently in the mempool

Spendbundle Docs: https://docs.chia.net/spend-bundles/
panels.title: Mempool Spendbundle Count

panels.description:
This shows the current cost of the mempool (how full the mempool is). Once the mempool is full, a fee is required to kick other lower fee transactions out to get your transaction included in the mempool.

Once a transaction is in the mempool, it will be included in blocks as there is space. Typically the highest "fee per cost" are included in blocks first.

Cost Info: https://chialisp.com/costs/
Mempool Info: https://docs.chia.net/mempool/
panels.title: Mempool Cost

panels.description: This is based on a transaction of 5,000,000 cost (estimated standard transaction cost). Since cost can vary based on a number of factors, the true number of transactions will vary.
panels.title: Transactions / Second (Estimated)

panels.description: How full each block is. Currently, there is a cap of 50%.
panels.title: Block Percent Full

panels.description: Total number of smart transactions to date (CATs, NFTs, etc)
panels.title: Smart Transactions (Hint Count)

panels.description: This shows the sum of fees that were actually paid for transactions that have been included in blocks.

targets.expr:
sum without(cluster, application, component, pod, service, instance, namespace, job, instance_name, ref, container, group, endpoint, region, exported_network) (
  sum_over_time(chia_full_node_block_fees{network="$network",component!~"bluebox"}[1h])
) 
/
sum without(cluster, application, component, pod, service, instance, namespace, job, instance_name, ref, container, group, endpoint, region, exported_network) (
  count_over_time(chia_full_node_block_fees{network="$network",component!~"bluebox"}[1h])
) 
/ 1000000000000

sum without(cluster, application, component, pod, service, instance, namespace, job, instance_name, ref, container, group, endpoint, region, exported_network) (
  sum_over_time(chia_full_node_block_fees{network="$network",component!~"bluebox"}[1d])
) 
/
sum without(cluster, application, component, pod, service, instance, namespace, job, instance_name, ref, container, group, endpoint, region, exported_network) (
  count_over_time(chia_full_node_block_fees{network="$network",component!~"bluebox"}[1d])
) 
/ 1000000000000

sum without(cluster, application, component, pod, service, instance, namespace, job, instance_name, ref, container, group, endpoint, region, exported_network) (
  sum_over_time(chia_full_node_block_fees{network="$network",component!~"bluebox"}[7d])
) 
/
sum without(cluster, application, component, pod, service, instance, namespace, job, instance_name, ref, container, group, endpoint, region, exported_network) (
  count_over_time(chia_full_node_block_fees{network="$network",component!~"bluebox"}[7d])
) 
/ 1000000000000

panels.title: Block Fees

panels.description: Shows the current fee estimate for an average "send xch" transaction for the specified target block inclusion timeframes.
panels.title: Fee Estimate - Send XCH

panels.description: Shows the current fee estimate for an average "send cat" transaction for the specified target block inclusion timeframes.
panels.title: Fee Estimate - Send Cat
